title: T206 Cobb/Matty for sale - one day
author: Jaybird

posts.post_title: T206 Cobb/Matty for sale - one day
posts.post_content:
Thought I would put these up for sale before I send them off to grading and then ebay.  I've priced them to sell.  If not, no worries.  Thanks for looking.

Rhodes - $60 incl. shipping - SOLD
Cobb - $500 incl. shipping - sent for grading
Mathewson - $600 incl. shipping - sent for grading

[IMG]http://i1023.photobucket.com/albums/af353/jasonleemiller/FOR%20SALE%20-%20T206/IMG.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i1023.photobucket.com/albums/af353/jasonleemiller/FOR%20SALE%20-%20T206/IMG_0001.jpg[/IMG]

Jason,

I'll take the Rhodes.

Let me know payment info.

Thanks,

Mike

Gorgeous Matty portrait.  Please update with how it grades...
Enjoy,
--S
Should have them back in a week or so and will update.
